actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing sympathy for those murdered and injured in the terrorist attack in Bali, Indonesia, on October 12, 2002, extending condolences to their families, and standing in solidarity with Australia in the fight against terrorism.

summary.text: Expresses condolences for those murdered and injured in the terrorist attack in Bali, Indonesia, on October 12, 2002, and condemns such attack.Expresses the solidarity of the United States with Australia in our common struggle against terrorism.Supports the Government of Australia in its call for the al-Qaida-linked Jemaah Islamiah to be listed by the United Nations as a terrorist group.Urges the Secretary of State to designate Jemaah Islamiah as a foreign terrorist organization.Calls on the Government of Indonesia to take every appropriate measure to bring to justice those responsible for this reprehensible attack.

titles.title: A resolution expressing sympathy for those murdered and injured in the terrorist attack in Bali, Indonesia, on October 12, 2002, extending condolences to their families, and standing in solidarity with Australia in the fight against terrorism.
